answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Attached are several policies that relate to hostile work environments. The first attached document is a policy for the Town of Littleton, MA. This policy may apply to discrimination (including harassment) that occurs between co-workers that takes place outside the workplace (including, but not limited to, online conduct).The second document is from the City of San Antonio, which addresses similar issues. The third document is form the Town of Brighton and it addresses hostile work related behavior and may be more aligned with what you are looking for. If you are looking for something more informal, please let me know and I can look further.
